articles.title: OpenAI CEO Sam Altman's Firing Retold as Hollywood Movie
articles.summary: The firing (and quick rehiring) of OpenAI CEO Sam Altman in late 2023 will be portrayed on the big screen in a new movie called "Artificial." Read more about the film, here.
articles.translated_title: OpenAI CEO Sam Altman's Firing Retold as Hollywood Movie

articles.title: ServiceNow offers 70% discount to federal government in AI push
articles.summary: ServiceNow Inc. is offering federal agencies discounts of as much as 70% on its software, a move aimed at spurring adoption as the Trump administration presses for faster government implementation of artificial intelligence tools.
articles.translated_title: ServiceNow offers 70% discount to federal government in AI push
articles.translated_summary: ServiceNow Inc. is offering federal agencies discounts of as much as 70% on its software, a move aimed at spurring adoption as the Trump administration presses for faster government implementation of artificial intelligence tools.

articles.title: Salesforceâ€™s struggling stock needs earnings to show AI progress
articles.summary: After months of pain, Salesforce Inc. investors will be scrutinizing the software maker's upcoming earnings for signs it will be a winner in the artificial intelligence boom, or one of its most high-profile victims.

articles.title: Starbucks rolls out AI for inventory counting
articles.summary: Starbucks is rolling out a new system for counting inventory that uses artificial intelligence technology to its more than 11,000 company-owned stores in North America by the end of September, the global coffee chain announced on Wednesday.
articles.translated_title: Starbucks rolls out AI for inventory counting
articles.translated_summary: Starbucks is rolling out a new system for counting inventory that uses artificial intelligence technology to its more than 11,000 company-owned stores in North America by the end of September, the global coffee chain announced on Wednesday.

articles.title: Ares' Star Says Her Character Reveals a Hard Truth About AI and Humans
articles.summary: Jodie Turner-Smith likened her character's arc to what happens when an artificial intelligence (like Grok) falls into the wrong hands.
articles.translated_title: Ares' Star Says Her Character Reveals a Hard Truth About AI and Humans

articles.title: Legal AI startup Eudia opens law firm under Arizona program
articles.summary: Eudia, a venture capital-backed startup that makes an artificial intelligence-powered platform for corporate legal teams, on Wednesday said it has launched a law firm in Arizona under loosened law firm ownership rules.
articles.translated_title: Legal AI startup Eudia opens law firm under Arizona program

articles.title: Apple is the big winner in Google antitrust penalty ruling
articles.summary: The iPhone maker may license generative artificial intelligence products outside of the Google ecosystem.

articles.title: Institutional Buying, Short Interest, and Upside
articles.summary: As quantum computing begins emerging as the next phase of the artificial intelligence race, Quantum Computing stock is a rally in the making.

articles.title: How one CRE giant is finding undervalued assets in unlikely areas
articles.summary: BGO, a global real estate investment manager with $89 billion in AUM, is using artificial intelligence to transform its investment research models.

articles.title: Salesforce cuts 4,000 jobs due to AI, CEO says
articles.summary: Salesforce CEO Marc Benioff revealed the company cut 4,000 customer support jobs and replaced them with Artificial Intelligence agents.
